content: **sweet satisfaction** *let children walk with nature let them see the beautiful blendings and communions of death and life their joyous inseparable unity as taught in woods and meadows plains and mountains and streams of our blessed star and they will learn that death is stingless indeed and as beautiful as life john muir* the inspiration for this skein-and-notion-holder came from the sugar skulls traditionally served for el día de los muertos while this skull may not be made out of sugar it is nonetheless very satisfying and oh so sweet
